title: Bug 37021: Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021: Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files. When targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath in declare warning messages is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. Note that sometimes the filenames do not appear at all in the messages, but this issue is not specifically reproduced in these tests.
OB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' rather than 'app/Main'. I have also observed instances where the filenames are not displayed at all, but these tests do not specifically reproduce that problem.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the sourcepath should be listed in the form 'app/Main' instead of 'app.Main.class'.
